body:
Just a simple question... Proxy, lag, and people hitting me from behind -.-

 Is it just me who's lagging, cause i'm tired when i'm behind someone and they hit me and i cant hit them. I'm really tired of it (Honestly).... Any suggestions if its me or the server, or whats going on. (Probably me but i keep getting disconnected for proxy, which means its probably me -.-) So I will not be playing Avicus for another week or so until I can fix it, or the server can  -thanks! 

Have a nice day! -vsplesk101

title: Is it just me?...

replies.body: I lag a lot too, but 20% of the time it's server lag, and 80% of the time it's client lag.
replies.body_tagged: I lag a lot too, but 20% of the time it's server lag, and 80% of the time it's client lag.

replies.body:
Today I had awful server lag and I know it was the server because I don't lag. 
Also a hub was down so maybe it was connected. Hopefully now its better.
replies.body_tagged:

Also a hub was down so maybe it was connected. Hopefully now its better.

replies.body:
Fortunately I don't get the lag you get; just occasional lag spikes and getting timed out (which I think is server lag, sometimes.)
Anything combat related is generally unaffected for me. Good luck on fixing your problems! :)
